layouts.title: Layouts
layouts.description: Layouts provide the majority use cases for laying out an application. They are not meant to be exhaustive so much as prescriptive about the most explicit and predictable way to create layouts.

item 2
item 3

.flx-justify-content-flex-end {  -ms-flex-pack: flex-end ;  justify-content : flex-end !important;  }
.flx-justify-content-center {  -ms-flex-pack: center ;  justify-content : center !important;  }

.flx-justify-content-space-around {  -ms-flex-pack: space-around ;  justify-content : space-around !important;  }

atoms.name: flex-item-fill-v2

item-1
item-2 (.flx-fill)

display: flex;/* webkit hack for height issues */
